text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Get a grip here Kayleigh. Having to take a low paying job with NO benefits just to survive is nothing to brag about. You need to say "due to the Trump White House's slow reaction to getting ahead on Covid19 , we saw the biggest job loss since the depression!
